title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: Some people are exposed to seeing dreams that make them feel psychological comfort, calm and peace, and one of these common visions is reading the Qur’an in a dream, which many people seek to interpret and find out its meaning. Indicates. Interpretation of a dream about lightning in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Reading the Qur’an in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who desires to become pregnant and reading the Holy Qur’an in her dream may foretell that pregnancy and childbirth will occur soon. Reading the Holy Qur’an in a married woman’s dream may indicate the husband’s good circumstances and good treatment of her, Which makes her live a life of stability and peace. Also, seeing the Qur’an reading in a dream for a married woman also indicates recovery from illness if the dreamer is afflicted with any disease or any health problem. Interpretation of a dream about peanuts in a dream in detail. Reading the Qur’an in a dream for a single woman, unmarried girl The one who reads the Qur’an in her dream will overcome all the difficulties and obstacles that stand in the way of achieving her dreams. Also, reading the Qur’an for a girl indicates her good reputation among people because of her purity, chastity, and good treatment of others. If a girl sees an ignorant young man reading the Qur’an in front of her in a dream, then this It means that she will marry a good, righteous man who is close to God Almighty. Reciting the Qur’an to a female student may be a sign of this girl’s excellence and that she will obtain final grades in her studies. Interpretation of a dream about carrots in a dream for a man to a woman. Reading the Qur’an in a dream in the genie Dream interpreters believe that reading the Holy Qur’an on Jinn in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will escape from evils and conspiracies against him by those around him. If the dreamer has enemies close to his life, reciting the Qur’an to the jinn indicates his victory over his enemies and the safety of those who harm them. Reciting the Holy Qur’an to the jinn may be from Signs of the dreamer abandoning the sins and misdeeds he committed in this period of his life. Interpretation of a dream about ice cream in a dream. Reading the Qur’an in a dream. Al-Osaimi confirms that reading the Qur’an portends good sustenance and for the one looking forward to earning a lot of halal money in the coming period. If the vision is sick, then reciting the Qur’an in The dream may herald recovery from his illness in the near future. If the dreamer is pregnant, then reciting the Qur’an in her dream bodes well for the health of the fetus and portends that she will give birth to the type of fetus she desires. Interpretation of a dream about cooking in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an with difficultyThe difficulty of reading The Qur’an is one of the signs that indicate that the dreamer has committed a great sin and disobedience in this period of his life and must return to God Almighty. Difficulty reading the Qur’an in a dream can also be a sign that the dreamer is suffering from difficult problems and troubles that will continue with him for some time. Difficulty in reading the Qur’an indicates that the dreamer is earning forbidden money from his current job. Interpretation of a dream about the imam of the mosque in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who reads the Qur’an in her dream heralds that woman an easy and simple birth process that will pass, God willing. The vision

title: Interpretation of seeing the tongue in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the tongue in a dream: The tongue is a part of the human body and it is in the mouth, and it has many uses and many benefits for humans through which a person speaks, tastes, and many other things, and the tongue in a dream has many. The meanings and concepts that we will mention in this article, so we talk about the interpretation of seeing the tongue in a dream and its interpretation for married and pregnant women, as well as the interpretation of some scholars in interpreting dreams. You may also be interested in the following: Bathing in a dreamLanguage in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing the tongue in a dreamMention of Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of a dream The language in a dream in the following points: Ibn Sirin said: The tongue in a dream indicates a slave. If the dreamer sees in his dream that his tongue is cut off and he cannot speak, this means that he will be harmed. And if the dreamer sees in his dream the tongue, and the dreamer is a merchant, then this dream appears His loss in trade. If the dreamer sees in a dream that part of his tongue was cut off, this indicates his inability to perform the Hajj obligation. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his wife cut off his tongue, this indicates her love for him. If the dreamer sees that his wife cuts off his tongue, this indicates He is a good and respectable person. If the dreamer sees that his tongue is stuck in his mouth, this indicates betrayal by the dreamer. If the dreamer sees that he has swallowed his tongue, this indicates remorse. Seeing yourself eating your tongue in a dream is an unpleasant vision. You may be interested in: Pregnancy in a dreamDream Language in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of language in a dream for a married woman has many connotations and meanings that I will mention in the following points: If a married woman sees in her dream her tongue being cut off, this indicates her loyalty to her husband. If a married woman sees the tongue in her dream, this means that good news will come. It makes her happy and makes her heart happy. A dream about language in an unmarried woman’s dream. A dream about language in an unmarried woman’s dream has many interpretations, which we mention in the following points: If an unmarried woman dreams of her tongue being cut off, this means that she is pure and honest. If she sees in her dream her tongue being cut off This indicates that her personality is strong. The penguin in a dream. The dream of a language in a dream for a pregnant woman. The dream of a tongue in a dream about pregnancy has many meanings, which we mention below: If a pregnant woman sees a tongue in her dream, this means that she will give birth. If a pregnant woman dreams that her tongue is cut out, this indicates deception after Suffering and that she will give birth to a healthy child. If she dreams that her husband cuts off her tongue, this indicates happiness and stability. The dream of language in a man’s dream. The dream of language in a man’s dream has many meanings, which we mention below: If a person sees in his dream that his tongue is tied, this indicates a loss in his business. If A man’s dream that his wife cuts out his tongue indicates her love and loyalty to her husband. If a man sees in a dream that his tongue is stuck in his mouth, this indicates that he is betraying his trust. Washing the dead. A dream about a language in a dream about a divorced woman. A dream about a tongue in a dream about a divorced woman has many connotations, which we mention below: If If a divorced woman sees her tongue in her dream, this indicates an interruption in her work. If a divorced woman sees her tongue in

title: Seeing him reciting Surah Al-Haqiqa in a dream

preview.html: Seeing reading Surat Al-Haqq in a dream, one of the dreams that many of us may see is the person who sees himself reading Surat Al-Haqq in a dream and seeks to interpret this vision to know and understand the connotations and signs it contains. We are present when we see reading and listening to Surat Al-Haqqa in a dream, and today we will talk about all of this in detail here in the article via the Encyclopedia website. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Haqqa: Whoever sees in his dream that he is reading or listening to Surat Al-Haqqa if he stands on the pulpit, this means that he will be crucified in Heresy in Islam. Ibn al-Musayyab believes that whoever dreams that he is reading Surat al-Haqq while sitting, this is a sign on his skin. The correct opinion is that if he sees an angel reciting it in his dream, this is a sign of the death of his kingdom, and if a witness reads it, he will stop his testimony, and if someone who has knowledge reads it on foot. . He would break the whips, but if he sat, he would be closed, but if he walked quickly, he would cut off his arms and legs. Some believe that if a sick person reads it, this is a sign that he will die soon. Ibn Shirin also believes that whoever sees in his dream that he is reading Surat Al-Haqq, this means that he is right. Some interpret seeing Surat Al-Haqq as a sign of the approach of God Almighty. Some also see that seeing Surat Al-Haqq in a dream is a sign of sin and then God repents to that person. Others say that this person was right because he speaks the truth in his hands and is blessed with goodness for 40 days. Some people interpret seeing Surah Al-Haqqiqa as an indication of the abundance of sustenance and the blessings of the dreamer, or supporter of the truth, and sometimes he fears being beaten and cut off. Seeing him reciting Surat Al-Haqqiqa in a dream: It indicates that the person’s reckoning has approached this world before the afterlife, and that the vision indicates... A message from God that the person with the vision corrects himself, approaches God Almighty, prays in the mosque, follows God’s commands, and avoids the Almighty. God Almighty forbade. However, he will be one of the losers in this world and will be martyred in the afterlife, so he must frequently and persevere in remembrance, glorification, seeking forgiveness, and repenting to God with sincere repentance, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Surah Al-Haqiqah in a dream about a married woman: When a married woman sees in her dream that she is reading The Thieves of the Truth, This is a sign and indication that she will be divorced soon.For a different dream interpretation, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing food in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing food in a dream: Ask about seeing food in a dream by Ibn Sirin. On the Moments website, we present to you what is new and distinctive in our article on our website: interpretation of dreams, interpretation of dreams, interpretation of food, seeing food in a dream, eating in a dream by Ibn Sirin, seeing food in a dream by Ibn Sirin, to see eating food in a dream, and raw meat in A dream, seeing shoes in a dream for a single woman, seeing food in a dream for a married woman, and seeing food in a dream for a pregnant woman. Learn more on the Moments website. Interpretation of seeing food in a dream: If a person sees in his dream that he is eating healthy and useful food. This indicates that this person will enjoy a healthy and useful life and will enjoy good health. Or if a person sees in a dream that he does not want to eat, regardless of Having a lot of delicious food. This indicates that he has many opportunities for success, but he is wasting them. But if a person sees in a dream that he is eating food with great difficulty and slowly, this means that this person looks at things from a narrow perspective. It also indicates that this person is suffering From distraction in thought and his inability to obtain the correct decree. But if a person sees that he is eating in a dirty place. This indicates that this person will be exposed to a major health crisis. But if a person is seen eating fruit, this means that he will obtain a lot of goodness. But whoever dreams that he is eating sand and gravel. This indicates this person’s violent desire to ask for money in any way, even if it is by violating the rights of others. Seeing food in a single woman’s dream. Dream interpretation jurists say: If a woman sees in her dream that she is eating She is single, so this indicates her strong desire to get married. Interpretation of a dream about eating a lot of food for a single woman in a dream, and the evidence is that she adheres to principles and values ​​and is distinguished by her good morals. Seeing a woman eating in a dream while she is doing the necessary rest in the dream, this means that something bad will happen to her. Seeing a woman eating with a fork and knife in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of her eagerness to choose her husband. As for seeing an unmarried girl eating lunch at a wedding, this is a sign that she is fine and an indication of her marriage or engagement soon. Seeing food in a married woman’s dreamIf a married woman sees food in In her dream, this means that she is suffering from many problems in her married life, especially financially. Or that she is suffering from a romantic void in her life that she cannot fill, or it is indicated by her intense desire to have children. Seeing food in a married woman’s dream indicates feelings of fear and insecurity. As Seeing a married woman eating in a dream means a lack of emotional feelings. Interpretation of a dream about delicious food in a married woman’s dream, as it is a sign of decent living and understanding between her and her husband in reality. Interpretation of seeing a dining table in a dream for a married woman filled with many items in a dream is evidence of The happy married life you live. Seeing food in a pregnant woman’s dreamIf a pregnant woman sees it

title: Green snake haunts me dream interpretations for single, married and divorced women

preview.html: The green snake is chasing me. Interpretation of dreams for single, married and divorced women. Interpretation of a dream about a green snake is one of the interpretations that carries a group of interpretations according to the situation in which the fortuneteller is during the vision in addition to the visionary situation in life. Interpretations must be taken from well-known interpreters to arrive at the interpretation in the following lines of The article, we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a green snake chasing me for a single woman, the interpretation of a dream about a green snake chasing me for a married woman, the interpretation of a dream about a green snake chasing me for a divorced woman and the interpretation of a dream about a green snake bite on my leg. The interpretation of dreams about a green snake chasing me for a single woman came to interpret a dream about a green snake chasing me for an unmarried woman. For a married woman, if she sees in a dream that a green snake is approaching her, then this indicates her short marriage in the future, and the green color that the snake carries shows the good character of her future husband, and if an unmarried woman sees that the snake is trying to touch her in this dream, this indicates that there is someone who wants to get close. From the owner of the vision, but this person has malicious and not innocent intentions towards this girl, so the owner of the vision must take care of this man. Interpretation of a dream about a green snake chasing me, a married woman. Interpretation of a dream that a green snake is chasing me, a married woman, indicates that there is a man in this life The woman wants to get close to her and has unwanted intentions. A married woman indicates an increase in livelihood, money, money, and the birth of children for the dreamer. The interpretation, as we mentioned, is according to the situation in which the dreamer is during the dream. Interpretation of a dream about a green snake chasing me. The interpretation of a dream about a green snake chasing me, a divorced woman in a dream, indicated that if a divorced woman sees a group of snakes in her dream, this indicates many difficulties and obstacles. faced by the visionary. A young woman, and that she will soon have a good and righteous husband, and if she sees the death of a green snake, this indicates that she will get rid of the enemies of her life who do not wish her well. Interpretation of a dream about a green snake biting on a legHe interprets a dream about a green snake biting his leg as saying that there is a person known to him for hypocrisy He wants to enter the life of the monarch, introduce him to the evil and obsession in his mind, and make this hypocritical person the path of the seer. In error and misguidance after walking on the path of guidance, so the person with the vision must beware as much as possible of the people around him who do not wish him well and make sure that he is on the right path, avoiding mistakes and consulting others. Before starting anything. It is noteworthy that the interpretation of a dream about a green snake chasing me comes according to the exact details mentioned by the owner of Vision.foot.

title: Interpretation of dreams: My brother died and I was crying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream: My brother died, and I was crying in the dream. In the following lines, we will learn about the interpretation of a dream: My brother died, and I was crying in the dream, as narrated by scholars, not personal interpretations. All of this and much more... Interpretation of dreams: My brother died, and I was crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream: My brother died, and I was crying in a dream. It may express the dreamer’s livelihood, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the death of an older brother and weeps over him in a dream, this may be a sign of kindness and sustenance, God willing. If the dreamer sees the death of a brother and weeps over him, this may indicate good changes, and God knows all that no one has seen. If The dreamer saw the death of a brother and cried over him in a dream. This may represent a victory over your enemy, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams for a brother who suffers from epilepsy in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for my brother who has epilepsy in a dream could be an indication of the bad deeds he is doing and he must repent, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees in Dreaming of a brother suffering from epilepsy, this may indicate his need to get closer to his brother and help him change for the better. If the dreamer sees one of his family members suffering from epilepsy in a dream, this may indicate someone who wants to harm him, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing a headless body in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a body without a head in a dream. A body without a head is one of the disturbing visions for its owner, and seeing a body without a head in a dream could be a good sign or it could be a warning or warning of the appearance of evil for a married, pregnant or divorced woman in various meanings today, Through the Vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a headless body in a dream in detail, based on major interpreters of opinion such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. Interpretation of the sight of a headless body by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a headless body indicates the dreamer’s confusion in his life. Seeing a headless body portends for the monarch to avoid what might get him into trouble. Seeing a headless body appearing on a regular basis indicates good news about his condition. Seeing a headless body in a dream could be the result of the subconscious mind and imagination. Interpretation of seeing severed heads in a dream. Seeing severed heads In a dream, it appears that he has a lot of money or a high status. Seeing the dreamer’s head cut off indicates that he has committed many sins and transgressions by confessing his sins. Seeing the head upside down in a dream indicates travel, but it will not be so. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a head in a dream. Seeing a severed head in a dream announces the liberation of slavery. Seeing a head being cut off in a dream portends the loss of a job. Seeing a head being cut off in a dream denotes the death of a person’s inner interests. Seeing a ruler cutting off a head in a dream announces freedom to prisoners. Seeing a head being cut off as a result of a criminal act in a dream predicts the loss of a parent or child. Interpretation of seeing a head in a dream. Seeing a head In a dream, it indicates a high position and earning money. Seeing the dreamer having two heads in a dream indicates achieving goals, achieving what one desires, and achieving quick profits. Seeing a child’s head in a dream indicates that the dreamer has many pleasures in life. Seeing the head hurting indicates stress and anxiety. About something. Interpretation of eating a human head in a dream. Seeing him eating a human head in a dream indicates the dreamer’s absence of an important person or ruler. Seeing the head cooked and eaten in a dream indicates the dreamer’s money or the ruler’s money. Interpretation of seeing an animal’s head in a dream. The dream of eating an animal’s head states the benefit of knowledge. Seeing him eating the head of an animal without cooking it indicates gossip and gossip. Seeing the head of a cooked animal indicates that the viewer will obtain money and livelihood. Interpretation of seeing an upside-down head in a dream. Seeing the head upside down in a dream indicates the traveler’s return to his country. Seeing the head upside down indicates that the viewer does not get For something he wants, except during its season. Seeing the head upside down with the eyes turned back indicates that the fortuneteller is a reserved and cautious type. Seeing an upside down head states that the dreamer commits a sin and then repents for it. Seeing that someone turns the leader’s head indicates that there is someone waiting for him and turning him. Seeing the head of a parent Upside down. It indicates the revelation of the secret that the monarch hid. Interpretation of seeing a small head in a dream. Seeing the head becoming smaller and smaller stipulates the circulation of days and deeds. Seeing the head

title: Everything you are looking for in the interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection: The Day of Resurrection is the day of truth and great reckoning when a person meets his Lord and gives an account for his actions in this world. There is no doubt that we all fear this day and wish to work for the world and prepare to meet God Almighty and take account, but what about seeing the Day of Resurrection in a dream? Is it a reminder and warning to the monarch or a warning? Does this vision have a good or bad connotation? If you are interested in searching for the meaning of this dream and learning about the opinions of major scholars and jurists such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, you can continue reading this article. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection What is the interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection? Is it good or bad? To find out the answer to this question, you can read the following: If the dreamer sees that he will be held accountable on the Day of Resurrection and his reckoning is difficult, then he may face worries and problems in his life. Seeing the dreamer standing alone and sad on the Day of Resurrection, far from his family, indicates that he committed sins and died in sin, so he must repent sincerely. And he asks for mercy and forgiveness. A difficult calculation on the Day of Resurrection in a dream may be a sign of entering into serious financial problems and not having them. Interpretation of a dream on the Day of Resurrection by Ibn Sirin. In his interpretation of a dream on the Day of Resurrection, Ibn Sirin mentioned positive and negative connotations, such as: Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of the vision of the Resurrection in The dream generally indicates the truth, the removal of injustice, and the distribution of the share fairly. If the monarch sees that he is arguing with his enemies, and the resurrection occurs, then this is evidence of his victory, if he is right, and if he is wrong, then it is a warning of disaster. And whoever sees in a dream the rise and end of the resurrection, then he Others make mistakes, whether by word or by action. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection by NabulsiIn his interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection, Nabulsi promised the monarch, as we see: And Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever sees in a dream the opening of graves and the dead coming out for judgment on the Day of Resurrection, he is righteous, spreading goodness and distributing rights equally among people. She says Al-Nabulsi: Seeing the end of the world in a single woman’s dream is a metaphor for the beginning of a new phase in her life. Interpretation of a dream about Doomsday for a single woman. In the process of discussing interpretations of a dream about Doomsday, we find different connotations of seeing an unmarried woman, such as: An unmarried woman who dreams of Doomsday is clear evidence of a change in her outlook. To the world, and her awakening from her neglect and work in the afterlife. Seeing the Day of Resurrection in a girl’s dream may reflect her poor psychological state and her control over feelings of fear and anxiety about something in her life. If a woman dreams of the Day of Resurrection in her sleep and cries, this is clear evidence of negligence in obedience to God, She must seek refuge in Him, and want to remember Him and perform the duties of worship. The vision is a warning to her. The rising of the Hour in a dream for an unmarried woman who is thinking about marriage and watching the division of the sky while wearing white clothes is a sign of a blessed marriage. Interpretation of a dream about spending the Day of Resurrection for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about judging the Day of Resurrection for a single woman varies depending on whether it is easy or difficult. If an unmarried woman sees the bill on the Day of Resurrection and it is hard in a dream, this may indicate a difficult journey

title: Interpretation of seeing cancer in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing cancer in a dream is according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Cancer is one of the diseases that frightens many people. It is a disease from which the afflicted person may not be cured, and if he is cured from it, the body cannot recover. As before, due to complications of treatment and the changes that the disease brings to the body, seeing cancer in a dream worries the fortuneteller. He often feels uncomfortable and afraid for his health, so in this article today we will learn together about me, the interpretation of seeing cancer in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream Seeing cancer in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation: Because cancer is a malignant disease, seeing it in a dream is a sign that someone close to the dreamer’s life is hypocritical and deceitful. Ibn Sirin confirmed that having cancer in a dream does not necessarily mean that he actually has it, but rather it expresses tensions and psychological problems. It disturbs the dreamer, and is evidence of many crises in his life. The dreamer who sees himself or someone close to him sick with this cursed disease in his dream is a sign that the person afflicted in the dream must change his life and lifestyle and pay more attention to his health. But if the dreamer sees himself in a dream suffering from cancer, this is evidence that the dreamer is a major cause of problems within the house in which he lives. He also doubts someone close to him about his influence on him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cancer in a dream for a man. If the dreamer is a man and sees himself suffering from cancer, this indicates his physical strength and good health. Contrary to what we expect, in the dream there is no indication of death, poverty, or illness. But if a man sees his wife in her dream and she has cancer in her stomach, this means that he will become angry with God Almighty and commit the immorality that God has forbidden to her, and he must be careful. If a man sees in If a man sees himself in a dream suffering from lung cancer, this is a sign of extreme boredom and his desire to travel or change. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cancer in a dream For a single woman: If an unmarried girl or a woman who has not yet married sees that she is sick with cancer in her dream, this is good news for her that she will not be affected by any malignant or dangerous disease in her life and that her health will be affected. It is good, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if a single girl in a dream who has cancer indicates that she suffers from feelings of anguish and loneliness and that she needs someone who understands her feelings. But if an unmarried girl sees someone in her dream, but she has cancer, this indicates that there is someone planning tragedies and machinations. And he tries with all his might to bring her down. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cancer in a dream for a married woman, because cancer is one of the most dangerous diseases known. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is sick with this cursed disease, this indicates that there is someone who hates her, cheats on her, destroys her, and shows her the opposite, so she should be careful. If a married woman sees herself in a dream suffering from cancer, this is a sign that the person who had the vision is not good. The intention is not

title: Interpretation of seeing apples in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans Seeing apples in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The apple is a fruit that brought Adam, peace be upon him, from heaven to earth. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing apples in a dream is mostly good, a blessing, children, and high positions, and the interpretation of a dream about apples varies depending on their color, red or green, and even according to the degree of color. Maturity. Apples are interpreted differently from rotten apples. Interpretation of seeing apples in a dream: An apple denotes knowledge, goodness, and benefit to people or temptation and temptation towards the right path. If the apple is red, this means that there are desires or laws that cannot be fulfilled and you want to break them to achieve your desire. If the apple is red, it means that there are desires or laws that cannot be fulfilled and you want to break them to achieve your desire. Colorful, it means calm and comfort. The dream refers to the wise and symbolizes intelligence and the use of reason with others. Interpretation of apples in a man’s dream: The apple symbolizes “man’s strength” and what interests him. If what he wants from the world is his profession, the apple means trade, if he has a high position, the apple symbolizes his position, if he cares about his children, the apple is a sign of a boy, and so on. . , What a man cares about most in life, the apple symbolizes for him, the connotations of apples are represented in relation to the man. If the apples are good and young, then your money is halal. If the apple is sour, spoiled and unfit for consumption, then the money you make is prohibited or part of it is prohibited, Mixed with permission. The apple tree means that the owner of this dream is a kind and sincere person whom people love very much. If a man dreams that he is on a wooden plank and his apples are tattooed, this is a symbol of marriage to a reliable woman. Apple Dream for Individuals Red apples in a dream for an unmarried woman mean love and that she is in A state of burning love or she is very jealous. Yellow apples are a sign of impossible desires or forbidden feelings. Eating green apples in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that she is a girl who chooses the right and stays away from suspicions and prohibitions. Yellow apples are a sign of bad choices and they need someone to guide them. On the right path. Eating apples in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of immorality and doing forbidden things. Interpretation of a dream about apples for a married woman. Apples in a dream for a pregnant woman means that her due date is near. Eating apples for a married woman means that she wants a man next to her husband and is fascinated by him if the apples are green. Apples are a sign of children in a married dream. Interpretation of buying apples in a dream. If the dreamer is single, then buying apples means that he creates an intimate relationship, and this relationship lasts a lifetime and ends with a happy marriage. Moth or mold, your business has failed or you have lost your money, and buying apples in general means that your money is lawful, and God Almighty has blessed what He has given you. Apples in a dream about the dead. The dream of taking apples from the dead in a dream and promising to eat them is evidence of the dreamer’s lack of money and wealth as he gave him dead. Seeing that you take good apples from the dead and eat them in a dream is a sign of goodness and happiness
